lead_paragraph: The United States national team leaves today for the Women’s World Cup in China and will open play Sept. 11 against North Korea. In the team’s final tuneup, Kristine Lilly, Shannon Boxx, Lindsay Tarpley and Heather O’Reilly scored Saturday night in a 4-0 win over Finland in Carson, Calif. Lilly became the second woman to reach 100 goals and 100 assists in international play. Mia Hamm was the first.
